name: Pizza Connection
description: Pizza Connection is a humorous business strategy game that challenges you to build a pizza empire from scratch.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Processor: 1,8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended) Storage: 1 GB available space
